tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_patterns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  rotation_frequency INT,
  last_rotation_date DATE,
  optimal_soil_condition VARCHAR(255)
)
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation patterns (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name STRING, crop_type STRING, last_rotated_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE CropRotationPatterns (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id UUID,
    rotation_year INT,
    rotation_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    crop_family VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE FarmFields (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    field_size FLOAT,
    field_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Farmers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
    farmer_age INT,
    farmer_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_patterns (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    planting_season VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    rotation_year INT NOT NULL,
    rotation_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE field_information (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    field_size DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    soil_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    last_crop_grown VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_varieties (
    variety_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    variety_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    planting_depth VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    harvest_period VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE planting_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    variety_id INT NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    planting_depth VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE harvest_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    variety_id INT NOT NULL,
    harvest_date DATE NOT NULL,
    harvest_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
